short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays ID metadata for embedded Kaltura media videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to be used within Canvas by Instructure to find the Entry ID's of Kaltura Media embedded within the LMS. Simply click on the extension icon and information appears on the page! New version 2.2.0 includes support for Kaltura Video Quizzes.

Note: This extension doesn't support LTI version 1.3
